fire.name: Fire Arrow
fire.summary: Area fire damage that burns nearby targets
fire.description: Leaves flames at the impact point dealing damage over time. Extremely effective against clustered targets and low-defense enemies.

ice.name: Ice Arrow
ice.summary: Freeze targets to gain time bonus
ice.description: Slows or briefly freezes enemies on hit. Great for control and starting combos when you need crowd management.

lightning.name: Lightning Arrow
lightning.description: Chains to adjacent targets to distribute damage to many enemies. Excels against scattered groups.

explosive.name: Explosive Arrow
explosive.description: Deals high damage to all enemies within the blast radius. Limited ammo—save it for bosses or dense packs.

triple.name: Triple Shot
triple.description: Covers a wide frontal area with slight spread—best at mid range for optimal performance.

homing.name: Homing Arrow
homing.description: Tracks its target to greatly increase hit rate. Ideal for fast-moving targets and long-range engagements.
